header.title: Komunhão Bookstore
header.subtitle: Freelance branding and marketing work for Christian bookstore.

text: With God’s mission of people’s lives edification through Christian literature, Komunhão is a family-managed bookstore that offers a variety of evangelical bibles, books and many other life-changing items since 2015 in the city of Cornélio Procópio, state of Paraná (in Brazil).

For this freelance project, the contribution was executed from 2015 to 2018 with marketing and branding jobs, mainly focused on social media posts and campaigns. By virtue of my digital design knowledge, all branding materials were developed, from business cards, posters and social media posts.
Tech stack: Photoshop, Illustrator, Social Media, Google Ads, Facebook Ads.
